name: Six Worlds
description:
Henry the Alien has a problem: his spaceship just exploded, leaving him stranded on a strange planet in the shape of a six-sided dice. Guide Henry through the six sides of the planet to find and collect the missing parts of his ride back home!

FLASHING LIGHTS WARNING

CONTROLS
W - climb up
A - left
S - climb down 
D - right
SPACE - jump
E - push button
left mouse click - roll the dice

This game was made for GMTKJAM2022 with the theme of Roll of the Dice with hand painted graphics and original tunes!

PROGRAMMER

Dicle T.

ART
level 2 and 6, main menu, ending screen - Hämäviita
level 1 and 4, character and animation - Renkku
level 3 and 5 opening screen - Hekate R.

MUSIC & SFXs:
Gimmickry

Programs: 
LMMS
Reaper

VSTs & Plug-ins & Sample Packs:
VibroMaster & Marimbaphonic by Alan ViSTa
Ample Bass P Lite II by Ample Sound
Keyzone Classic by Bitsonic LP
Samsara Cycle Harmonica & Samsara Cycle Ocarina by Christopher Clews
DSK SoundFx vol 1 by DSK Music
TyrellN6 & Zebralette by u-he
Eclipsis by vstzOne
Pancake 2 by Cableguys
KeroVee & RoVee by g200kg
Azurite by Distorque
Ozone Elements 8 by iZotope
Noisetar by NUSofting
Voxengo OldSkoolVerb
